author: lightclient
content: One thing I would like to understand: is there a way to make a request from the browser to the engine api on the localhost _without_ the origin field set? Or in general, is there a better way to defend against websites making requests to the local EL?

author: holiman
content: Hey wait. A smarter way, which solves any problem with e.g cross-domain post, is to use a fixed jwt-secret. Then webpages cannot make the request, because they cannot set custom headers.
